channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The best time to book flights for the cheapest airfare for the holidays
item.description: Experts share their advice on the best time to book flights so you can save money on airfare this year.

item.title: Secondary screening? TSA requiring some flyers to show IDs again at the gate

item.title: Bilt Rent Day (Oct. 1): Amazon and rent credit redemption bonuses, new neighborhood experiences and more
